page.title: 04PERKINS ENGINES 1
page.content: 50 years ago{Frank Perkins}founded {Perkins Engines.}During the war{ {Perkins}made engines for British ships and submarines.In 1957 they changed the site of{Perkins}to Eastfield where it still remains now.{Perkins}have 5100 workers at their Eastfield plant and Â£51m pounds a year is spent on wages.{Perkins}have to spend Â£1300000 a year on rates and Â£15m a year on tax.{Perkins}own a number of sports facilities over the country.{Perkins} design and build engines for Combine Havesters,Tractors,Ships,Lorries,Fire- Engines and parts for pnuematic drills.{Perkins}can make 200,000 engines a year at their{Peterborough {plants,last}year they made 129,000 engines,{Perkins}world wide can make 600,000 engines a year,each costing around Â£2,000.
